meanings.definition: A person who occupies land or property rented from a landlord.
meanings.sent1: The tenants in the apartment building pay rent every month.
meanings.sent2: The tenants of the house take good care of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tenants organized a fun barbecue in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The tenants of the office space bring life to the building.
meanings.sent5: The tenants welcomed a new neighbor to the community.

meanings.definition: A person or group that holds or occupies a position or place.
meanings.sent1: The team members are the tenants of the top spots in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The tenants of the leadership roles guide the company towards success.
meanings.sent3: The tenants of the front row seats cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The tenants of power must act responsibly for the benefit of all.
meanings.sent5: The tenants of the key positions work together for a common goal.
